price: Doğrusu ahirete iman etmeyenler, melekleri dişi isimlerle isimlendirirler.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ تَسۡمِيَةَ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati layusammūna al-malāikata tasmiyata al-unthā
